#summary Overview of the themoviedb.com Provider


= Introduction =
This provider will search the themoviedb.com for movies using the api provided by themoviedb.com.  This provider uses an api_key that has been provided to this project.

= Details =

To use this provider, simply pass the --provider=themoviedb.com to the java command line.

{{{
java -jar MetadataTool.jar --provider=themoviedb.com
}}}

If you want to convert your collection from imdb to themoviedb.com, then you can use the following command.

{{{
java -jar MetadataTool.jar --provider=themoviedb.com --force --forceThumbnail MOVIE_DIR
}}}
